column3:
ほう謎の声を聞いたとな？
ふむふむ時が満ちたと告げられたか…
column4:
Hm? What's this? A voice beckoned you
here? I see. So the time has come.

column3:
ならば儂は その大いなる試練について
知る限りを伝えるとしよう
column4:
I shall now tell you all I know about the
arduous trial that awaits you.

column3:
この試練は それを解き放つ事ができるか
主の力を試すもの
column4:
This trial shall test your courage to
ensure you are worthy of this splendor.

column3:
これまで磨きぬいた知恵と勇気で
剣の試練に打ち克った その時こそ…
column4:
Once you have tempered your soul and
proven your wisdom and courage by
completing the Trial of the Sword...

column3:
主が その手に取り戻した剣…
マスターソードは真の輝きを秘めておる
column4:
That sword you have reunited with...
the Master Sword...it has yet to realize
its true splendor.

column3:
既に手に入れた武器や防具は封印されるゆえ
あるがままの姿で敵に立ち向かわねばならぬ
column4:
All of your weapons and armor will be
sealed away. You must face your enemies
without the tools you've come to rely on.

column3:
すなわち剣の試練…
これまでになく苛烈を極める試しとなろう
column4:
It is called the Trial of the Sword.
It will challenge you as you have
never been challenged before.

column3: マスターソードは初めて主の剣となる！
column4: the Master Sword shall truly be yours!

column3:
…ふむ その表情から察するに
試練に挑む気は充分のようだな
column4:
...Hm. Unless my eyes deceive me,
you seem quite willing to take on this
trial. A hero through and through!

column3:
ならば主よ
その台座にマスターソードを挿し戻すのだ
column4:
Now, Link... Place the Master Sword
in its pedestal.
